alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:48PM EDT until June 17 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 148 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Webster, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Wheelersburg, South Webster, Lyra and Powellsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
